title: Bootstrap Offcanvas
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Hidden Sidebars
Offcanvas is a sidebar component that slides into the viewport (left, right, top, or bottom). It's crucial for mobile menus.

### Structure
1. `.offcanvas`: Wrapper.
2. `.offcanvas-start` (left), `-end` (right), `-top`, `-bottom`.
3. `.offcanvas-header`, `.offcanvas-body`.

### Triggering
Similar to Modals: `data-bs-toggle="offcanvas"`.

interview_questions.question: Difference between Offcanvas and Modal?
interview_questions.answer: Modal is a centered dialog box. Offcanvas is a slide-out panel attached to the viewport edge. Offcanvas is better for navigation menus.

real_world_use_cases.description: Hamburger menu opens an Offcanvas sidebar.
Click cart icon -> Offcanvas slides from right showing items.

exam_notes: Can have backdrop or scrolling enabled.
summary: Offcanvas is the standard component for mobile navigation and side panels.
